triangulateAsBound

public BoundingTri[] triangulateAsBound()
Triangulate this bound, fails if vertex count is less than 3. Base of Bounding always returns null.

triangulate

public Triangulation triangulate()
Triangulate this bound, fails if vertex count is less than 3. Base of Bounding always returns null.

convexAsBound

public BoundingPoly convexAsBound()
Convex hull this bound, fails if vertex count is less than 2. A Bounding Polygon is returned.

convex

public ConvexHull convex()
Convex hull this bound, fails if vertex count is less than 2. A ConvexHull object is returned.
